title: Ingersoll Rand VR-843 Reach Lift
item_description:
Ingersoll Rand VR-843 Reach Lift

  • Make: Ingersoll-Rand
  • Model: VR-843C
  • Serial: 173884
  • Mfg Code: 2003
  • HP: 110
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Tractor Mass: 23,300 lb
  • Fork Length: 47”
  • Fork Width: 7”
  • Number of tires: 4
  • Tire Size: 13.00-24
  • Hours: 3889
  • Function Tested: Yes, see video
  • Function Test:
    • Booming in and out
    • Tilting up and down
    • Moving arm up and down
    • Driving unit forward and backward
    • Tilting unit left and right
    • Turning wheels in three different wheel settings

CARB Off-Road Diesel Disclosure Statement: “When operated in California, any off-road diesel vehicle may be subject to the California Air Resources Board In-Use Off-road Diesel Vehicle Regulation. It therefore could be subject to retrofit or accelerated turnover requirements to reduce emissions of air pollutants. For more information, please visit the California Air Resources Board website at http://www.arb.ca.gov/msprog/ordiesel/ordiesel.htm.”
